property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Superion on the battlefield -> Do 1 damage to each enemy. If you have 5 Aerialbots in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area -> Combine them into Superion, Sky Protector. (A combiner begins untapped, has all damage from the combined characters, and keeps 1 Upgrade in each slot.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Aerialbots only. The upgraded character has +1 attack for each of your other tapped Aerialbots.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap the top 2 cards of your deck. Put an Action and an Upgrade scrapped this way into your hand. You may play Unleased Potential.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> You may play another Attack Drone. Up to 3 Attack Drones can fit in 1 Weapon slot.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you began the game with only Decepticon characters : Repair 1 damage from each of your characters. Then do 1 damage to each Autobot.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 3 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Cars only. Damage counters can't be moved from other characters to the upgraded character.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Sentinels only. When the upgraded character attacks : You may flip a Sentinel in your KO area from bot mode to alt mode. If you do, then flip it back to bot mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Then Scrap 2 cards from your hand. If you began the game with only Autobot characters : You may play an Action.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Ranged character -> Repair 1 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an enemy in bot mode. Your opponent flipts it too alt mode.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Planes only. When the upgraded character is KO'd during your opponent's turn -> Do damage equal to its attack total to a tapped enemy.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Decepticons only. When one of your Decepticons attacks : Plan 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: If the upgraded character would take non-attack damage from an opponent's card ; instead the upgraded character takes that much damage minus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Volcanicus on the battlefield : He gets Bold 2 until end of turn. If you have 5 Dinobots in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area : Combine them into Volcanicus, Fiery Champion.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Dinobots only. When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [O][O] : Do 1 damage to the attacker.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is battling an enemy that has the same number of stars as it : The upgraded character has +2 attack and +2 armor

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least one orange pip -> Do 1 damage to the attacker.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a Melee character -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When you put this on a character -> Scrap an enemy Weapon.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: (A character's Armor can't go below 0.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your characters from bot mode to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a battle icon color. Then look at your opponent's hand and scrap a card from it that has a battle icon of that color.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 3. After the upgraded character defends : Scrap this card.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When you pthis on a Specialist : Scrap the top card of your deck. You may play that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters. If it's an Autobot, Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 damage counter from one of your characters to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Focus Fire you've played this turn : One of you characters gets Bold 1 until end of turn. You may play another Focus Fire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each palyer chooses 2 cards from their hand and scraps the rest. Each player with fewer than 2 cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +2 attack until end of turn. While it's attacking an enemy this turn that has fewer stars than it, it has Pierce 4.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tap one of your untapped characters that has 5 stars or more : Do 3 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Tap one of your untapped Specialists that has 5 stars or more -> Draw 3 cards

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is battling : Each [O] you flip becomes a [B]. Each [B] you flip becomes a [O].

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap the top card of your deck. You may play that card. Then scrap another card from the top of your deck. You may play that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have a Ranged character on the battlefield -> Do 2 damage to an enemy in bot mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plan 6.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks : Plan 2. When you put a card from your hand on top of your deck : the upgraded character gets +1 ATK until end of turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: This can be in an Armor or Utility slot.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Autobots only. While the upgraded character is attacking an Decepticon : It has pierce 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 2 cards

property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 3. After the upgraded character attacks, Scrap this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have a Predaking on the battlefield : Draw a card. Then you may play an Upgrade. If you have 5 Predacons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area : Combine them into Predaking, Ferocious Hunter.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your Autobots, it gets +2 ATK until end of turn. Choose an enemy Decepticon. it gets -2 DEF until end of turn.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip one of your characters to it's other mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets +4 attack until the end of turn. At end of turn, do 3 damage to it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character is battling : Flip 1 more battle card. Scrap one of the cards you flipped without using it's battle icons.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from one of your characters.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Decepticons only. While the upgraded character is attacking an Autobot : It has Pierce 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap the top card of your deck. If it's an upgrade, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card. Then Plan 1.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends -> Draw a card. Then Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Optimus Maximus on the battlefield : Scrap an enemy weapon or armor. If you have 6 Sentinels in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area : Combine them into Optimus Maximus, Ultimate Defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and scraps it. If this is the third Sonic Scramble you've played this turn -> Draw 3 cards. You may play another Sonic Scramble.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: If an opponent's card would cause a Weapon or Armor to be scrapped from the upgraded character -> Scrap this card instead.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 2.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. When it does more than enough attack damage to KO an enemy this turn -> Your opponent chooses one of their other characters and puts the extra damage on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have menasor on the battlefield : Draw 2 cards. If you have 5 Stunticons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area : Combine them into Menasor, Menacing Colossus.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Stunticons only. Enemies can't use Bold or Tough against the upgraded character.

property.value: Play this only if you've played Tech Research this turn. Bold 4.

property.value: Play this only if you've played Tech Research this turn. Pierce 4.

property.value: Draw 2 cards. Then Scrap 2 cards from your hand. If you began the game with only Decepticon characters : You may play an Upgrade.

property.value: Tap one of your untapped Melee characters : Tap an untapped enemy character that has the same number of Stars or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player draws 2 cards.

property.value: Put on Predacons only. The upgraded character can have a Weapon or Armor in it's Armor slot.

property.value: Do 1 damage to an enemy. If it's KO'd this way, repair 1 damage from one of your Deceptipcons.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you've played Ancient Wisdom this turn -> Choose a battle card you own from outside the game that has 1 star and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap all enemy Weapon, Armors, or Utilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Scrap an enemy Upgrade.

property.value: While this has a Utility : He has Pierce 3.

property.value: While this has a Weapon : he has Bold 2.

property.value: At the end of your turn, if you have Dreadwind Air Defense in bot mode on the battlefield in your KO area : You may scrap 3 cards from your hand. If you do, combine Dreadwind and Blackwing into Dreadwing Sky Destroyer.

property.value: Super Rare

property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O] [B] -> Draw a card. After the battle, flip this to one of his other modes.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [W] [O] [B] : Flip this to alt mode after the attack

card.name: Blurr - Fastest Bot in the Galaxy

property.name: Text
property.value: When this does attack damage to a tapped enemy while there's at least one untapped enemy : This untaps and attacks the untapped enemy.

alternate.name: Blurr - Fastest Bot in the Galaxy

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card.

property.value: When this attacks -> You may scrap cards from your hand equal to the number of stars on the defender. If you do, KO the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this or one of your other Insecticons is KO'd : Your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand ans scraps them.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your opponent has no cards in hand : Each of your insecticons has Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you have fewer cards in your hand than your opponent : Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this battles and you flip your first [W] : Flip 3 extra battle cards for that [W] instead of 2.

property.value: When you flip to this mode: This gets +1 ATK until end of turn for each character ni your opponent's KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 1. When this does enough attack damage to KO an enemy without doing extra damage : Untap this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode : Your opponent reveals a card at random from their hand. If it's an Action, scrap it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, if you have Blackwing Air Defense in bot mode on the battlefield in your KO area : You may scrap 3 cards from your hand. If you do, combine Dreadwind and Blackwing into Dreadwing Sky Destroyer.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this has 4 or more damage counters -> he has +1 attack

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may discard your hand. If you do and those cards have battle icons of exactly 4 different colors, do 4 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this battles and you flip battle icons of exactly 4 different colors -> This gets +4 attack and +4 defense until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks : Choose a Dinobot you own from outside the game. Pit into your KO area in alt mode (fully damaged).

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is in your KO area and you flip to this mode : Each of your characters gets Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.value: When this attacks : You may scrap an Upgrade from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.value: Your other characters can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

property.value: If this would defend : Instead you may choose one of your other stunticons to defend.

property.value: When an enemy car attacks : Do 1 damage to it.

property.value: When you flip to this mode : Repair 1 damage from this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the game begins and you have only Sentinel characters : Choose up to 3 different Sentinels you own from outside the game. Put them into your KO area in alt mode (Fully damaged).

property.value: When you flip to this mode : This can attack untapped characters this turn as though they were tapped.

property.value: Bold 1. When this attacks and you flipe at least [W][O][B] -> Flip him to bot mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.value: Tough 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Repair 1 damage from one of your Aerialbots.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> return a card that has no battle icons from your scrap pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per turn, when you play or flip a battle card that has no battle icons -> This gets +3 attack and +3 defense until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return a card that lets you Plan from your scrap pile to your hand.

property.value: When you flip Decepticon Crown while this is battling -> This gets +3 attack and +3 defense until end of turn.

property.value: When this is in your KO area and you flip to this mode : Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your other characters attacks : you may tap this. If you do, the attacker gets +attack until the end of the turn equal to this character's attack total.

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemy characters can't be repaired.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode : Draw a card, then Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> For each card in your opponent's scrap pile that has at least [B][B], your opponent chooses one of their characters and does 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemies can't use Tough. Pierce 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode : Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has battle icons of at least 2 different colors, you may play it.

property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an enemy in Combiner mode : Each of your characters gets Pierce 4 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks on the turn he's combined : For each battle card you flip that has at least [O], do 1 damage to the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: This has 5 Weapon slots. When this is combined : Draw a card. Then you may play a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 1, Pierce 1. You may play an extra action on each of your turns. When this is combined : Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this battles : Draw a card then Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1, Tough 2, Pierce 3. When this is combined -> Do 3 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: This 2 Weapon slots, 2 Armor slots, and 2 Utility slots

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode, choose one -> Draw a card / Do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your other characters would take 2 or more attack damage -> Instead you may have this take 2 of that damage and your other character take the rest.

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Constructicons only. When the upgraded character attacks -> Put a height counter on your Tower.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Devastator on the battlefield -> Repair 1 damage from him, then put a height counter on your Tower. If you have 6 Constructicons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area -> Combine them into Devastator, Towering Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to an enemy. If your Tower is 6 or higher, do 3 damage to that enemy instead

property.name: Text
property.value: Put an Upgrade from your scrap pile on top of your deck. If your tower is 3 or higher, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have fewer than 4 cards in hand, draw cards equal to the difference

property.value: At the start of the game -> Put your Tower tracker into your KO area with a height counter on it.

property.value: When this or one of your other Constructicons is KO'd while this is on the battlefield or in your KO area -> Put a height counter on your Tower

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is combined, repair an amount of damage from him equal to the height of your tower. While your Tower is 6 or higher, this has Bold 2. While your Tower is 10 or higher, change this character's base ATK from 6 to 10.
